attributes.action: Proclaim the first week in June National James 'Mascot' Green week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to his phenomenal services to society and indeed, the world, we the undersigned demand a week in the UK be dedicated to him in order to reflect upon the ways in which we can all try and emulate James 'Mascot' Green.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
